p: Synthesized cDNA was used to amplify Candida albicans INT1 gene with the primers and conditions established by Lim and Li [ 44]. B-actin was used as a housekeeping gene to normalize the expression [ 46]. The level expression of INT1 gene was calculated according to E = Peff(−ΔCt), where Peff is the primer efficiency calculated using LinRegPCR [ 47]. Fold changes were calculated between the ratio expressions of all conditions analyzed for two biological replicates.
